website_summaries.verdict: Dark-roast lovers will appreciate the truly bold flavor and the low price point.
pros: Amazon went for the bold, and they got it
This full-bodied roast is undeniably bold
We found it comparable to an Italian roast, with less acidity
There is a pleasant fragrance while brewing
The coffee stays strong even at the 12 oz
Even cream and sugar won't take away too much from the boldness
The quality build of the cups stays consistent, as does the taste
Sits at a lower price point than most
cons: May be considered too strong by some

customer_reviews.title: Extremely WEAK tasting
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. I purchased these K-cup pods due to their favorable price per pod cost and the reported 4.2 star rating. I'm amazed that it scored 4.2 stars as the coffee produced is EXTREMELY weak tasting. Even when I used two pods, with the smallest (5 oz. ?) cup setting, the coffee was still very weak. Obviously, using two pods per cup defeats the original price per pod advantage when compared to other "Medium Roast" pods available. (I'm going to check if I can return the remaining unused pods (77 of the 80 received) to Amazon for a refund.)
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lamprecht

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by great taste
customer_reviews.text: As an avid Starbucks coffee drinker, I wasn't expecting much from this coffee but thought I would give it a try. I'm glad I did. It may not have the "bite" of Starbucks, but it has a wonderful, full robust flavor that is perfect for morning coffee or late night coffee. I'll be buying this coffee again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Real coffee flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the burnt flavor of many of the coffee roasts on the market today. I prefer Yuban Colombian medium roast coffee. The K Cup pods are not readily available any more. This blend comes close. The rich coffee flavor comes through. The acid level is low so it is a great cup to start my day. I think I have found my new favorite coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Grove

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee
customer_reviews.text: Received a Keurig coffee maker for my birthday. We usually drink Starbucks Colombia in our automatic drip maker. This coffee tastes even better imho. Super smooth and delicious. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kerbie

customer_reviews.title: Weak and Flavorless
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE Amazon and put a lot of faith in their products, however they could not have missed the mark more with this coffee. It was a “bold” move to name this blend The Bold, or even refer to it as a dark roast, as it is quite literally the most flavorless coffee my husband and I have ever drank. “The Dishwater” would have been more apt. I never take the time to write reviews, but felt compelled to save a family’s morning...if you look forward to a rich, dark, flavorful roast to get your day started, keep scrolling.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great dark roast coffee
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality coffee k-cup. Fit and worked perfectly in my brewer. I love a dark roast and I am very picky about my coffee, this exceeded my expectations. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rice

customer_reviews.title: Warm water with a hint of coffee
customer_reviews.text: I can't understand how anyone could possibly give the French Vanilla a positive review. It's SO weak. I dump a bunch of instant cappucino powder in it to make it drinkable till I get through it bc I can't bring myself to throw them out since I paid for them. Get your Kcups elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Tasty cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This is very good coffee and cups are solid to work in the Keurig. My Keurig is an older model that doesn't look for the Green Mountain brand/chip, so can't comment about that. I could drink this coffee every day - nice and smooth flavor.
customer_reviews.author: chlte

customer_reviews.title: 2 Bugs in my K-Pods
customer_reviews.text: In my first batch, there was a bug in one of my pods that made it into my coffee cup but I didn’t drink it. I thought it was a fluke so I ordered another batch. Today I almost swallowed another bug. There are some serious quality control issues. Photo is of the SECOND bug that I almost drank.
customer_reviews.author: K. Raynes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NO.
customer_reviews.text: Awful flavor. What a waste of my money. Buy a known brand. I bought gevalia last time. Worth the extra $
customer_reviews.author: Derryn

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally not a fan of Decaf coffee, but, if I drink coffee in the evening I'm up all night. So I keep some decaf k-cups for after dinner times. The amazon-fresh Columbia Decaf is far better tasting than others I have tried. It has a bold, rich flavor and aroma I've enjoyed from my fresh ground single source coffees I have in the mornings. I enjoy this decaf much more than others I've tried in the past. It is now my 'go-to' evening beverage. I recommend this to coffee lovers who, like me, can't tolerate that late day caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: CaptBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Poor delivery service
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is good. The deliver service that stuffed it in my mail box was deplorable. I had to tear the box apart to remove the product. See picture attach. There were larger drop boxes avail.
customer_reviews.author: cal restivo

customer_reviews.title: Good-enoug cup of coffee for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use K-Cups for a GREAT cup of coffee. I use them for a quick, good-enough cup of coffee. This is especially true for pairing with desserts when I’m tired and don’t want to make french-press or even drip. These K-Cups make a good-enough decaf cup of coffee...as good as more expensive K-Cups.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: More like a light roast than a medium roast
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed with this blend - too light for me. It's much closer to a "light" brew than it is to "medium" in my opinion. The flavor of it is fine, it's just not flavorful enough. If you prefer a lighter blend of Colombian, then you'll probably love it, but if, like me, you like strong coffee, you may find this a bit lacking.
customer_reviews.author: JB Maverick

customer_reviews.title: has an odor
customer_reviews.text: Smelled very slightly of urine when brewing. Taste was only tolerable with cream. However, I did give an extra star for packaging. The K-cups were loose packed in one cardboard box. I liked that better than them coming in a bunch of separate boxes. Returning the item after trying 2 cups brewed different ways and couldn't make it taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Local

customer_reviews.title: A better deal
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to try this as I'm fairly picky about my coffee. But we have a Keurig in our office and I figured if I didn't like it I'd donate it to the shared pile. Well i loved it! it's more flavorful than Green Mountain which is what I was buying, I like that it's a medium roast, most hazelnut coffees out are a light roast and I like a darker roast. It also has more pods for less money than GM so that's a win as well. I will continue to buy Amazon Fresh coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Silver Angel

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I saw the reviews and decided to give the variety box a try. If you are a lover of good coffee do not get these. Light roast- if they made an extra light roast this would be it. Medium roast- this was good but not great. Dark roast- if you like your coffee tasting like it is burnt then try this. I love dark roast coffee and I about spit this out when I tried it. I am going back to my Folgers Black Silk coffee.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is bland, and exploding cups are a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy these again. The coffee was weak and not very flavorful, definitely not a medium roast. I had quite a few explosions which is a pain when your in a hurry, which to me is why I use kcups instead of a coffee maker, because I make a quick cup and run out the door. I gave an extra star because the price was great, but these to me, were not worth the hassle, for a not so great coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell W

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the same brand of coffee for years. Unfortunately, it's gotten very expensive. I happened to spot this brand and figured I'd give it a try. Keep in mind that I've tried many other brands but didn't like them at all and usually ended up giving them away. The Amazon Columbian is as good as my favorite brand and after drinking about 1/2 the box of it-I'm wiling to say that it's even better than my preferred brand. I will be buying this again and if it's the same great taste and strength as this one - this will be my new favorite brand. Great coffee Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The "medium roast" label is spot on.
customer_reviews.text: I normally enjoy really strong bold coffee. The past few years this high octane coffee leaves me with very uncomfortable heartburn. Switched to a light roast coffee and the heartburn was alleviated but I craved something stronger. This medium roast coffee is exactly what it claims. Not too strong and not too light. Very flavorful coffee here, with just enough kick. A nice amount of k-cups for the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. F.  II

customer_reviews.title: Tastes as advertised - bargain for decaf
customer_reviews.text: On those days when you prefer the convenience of a Keurig cup, this is a decent decaf. Medium body with a clear finish. The price is hard to beat. I usually grind Peet's Mocha-Java whole beans, but this is fine for my lazy days.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Oven Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not “French vanila”, but just “Plain, no vanila either”.
customer_reviews.text: No flavor of French Vanila. Very plain, no tastes. I will throw away, just a waste of money. Will never buy “Amazon” brand.
customer_reviews.author: Oak Tree

customer_reviews.title: This is very BAD "coffee"!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea where the 5 star reviews are coming from but I like by coffee black with a spot of cream. This coffee tastes like you are using the same k cup a second time. Colored, hot water with a faint, almost negligible, taste or smell of coffee and that may well be placebo....I thought of donating some 70 k-cups but threw them out. Don't wish this on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gautam Banerjea

customer_reviews.title: Love it - I drink this straight without creamer!
customer_reviews.text: Getting something from Amazon and being coffee is always a little risky. Especially this much!! So I tried this at a family members house and was blown away. Then he told me the price of what he paid for it, that coffee was simply amazing!! I try not to use creamer and many other coffees you need it. This one you don't! The french vanilla flavoring is perfect. As a reviewer of many things on Amazon, I definitely think this item is worth the price and beats many expensive K-Cups. Give it a shot, I don't think you'll regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about ordering this mystery coffee, but I love it! The k-cups arrive loose in a big box, but coffee is so good, I gladly overlook the non-packaging!
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is now officially my "go-to" coffee. I love trying different ones and will occasionally order a variety pack, but I'll always come back to this one. It has a rich, smooth flavor on the tongue and it's strong enough to make a difference in the morning! Very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Judith952

customer_reviews.title: All I’ll say is WOW
customer_reviews.text: Im a coffee snob. I’ve been drinking nothing but Starbucks for years. For some reason my local supermarket stopped selling my Vanilla flavored Starbucks pods so I turned to Amazon to purchase some. I accidentally ran across this Amazon Fresh version and thought it was worth a try. I didn’t have high expectations at all. To my utter amazement this coffee is GREAT. It’s full of flavor and fresh. I’m now hooked on this brand and look forward to purchasing it again.I just wish Amazon would sell it in larger boxes of 22. If you have any doubt - don’t. If you enjoy Vanilla flavored coffee from Starbucks- then your in for a real treat. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: Tobi D

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly robust
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different brands of k-cups and have been very disappointed in the strength of the coffee. I have even resorted to making a cup of coffee with two k-cup, setting the water to the lowest amount so that i can get a nice strong cup of coffee. Some of the more expensive brands (Peet's, Starbucks, etc.) are better, but twice the cost. I ordered the AmazonFresh Bold Dark Roast and to say I'm shocked at the flavor is an understatement. It's a nice, strong-yet-smooth flavor. The cost per cup is only 40 cents and I don't have to use two. I highly recommend giving this coffee a try.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Herencia

customer_reviews.title: Medium coffee.. perfect if you like hazelnut and medium roast coffee
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, tasting and good coffee. The smell of it, when it is brewing, is delicious, my house smells like a Starbucks and I love it. The box came without extra packaging, but it arrives in good condition. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Albany Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Fresh French Vanilla K-cups
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Fresh French Vanilla K-cups 80 count. I ordered on the Prime Days and really didn’t know if I would like it. Well, I have to say it is really good. I usually buy Starbucks Vanilla which I like but it’s sort of expensive. Amazon Fresh is almost as good just not quite as strong which is fine because Starbucks is almost too strong for me. It has that good French vanilla tastes that I love! This is going to be my go to K cup now! Glad I found these on Prime Day!
customer_reviews.author: PgH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste like french vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately bought 80 of these because the price was good. They have a black licorice/black pepper taste to them - they do not remotely taste like french vanilla. I should have read all of the reviews before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi O

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I admit - I was skeptical... Amazon brand coffee?? I love it. I drink my coffee black and it's so smooth and not bitter at all. My husband is the pickiest coffee drinker ever - he prefers the lighter blends - like the "breakfast blends" or "blonde roasts" and he even likes this! Big fan - definitely recommend this coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Bookapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Blond Coffee but great flavor for decaf
customer_reviews.text: This was such a light roast that 8 oz. brew is very weak in flavor - I like a little of a boldness so usually brew a medium roast but thought it would be nice to have a less bolder coffee for evening. I do enjoy it if I brew a 6 oz. cup and get a great flavor for a decaf drinker. I had originally put in for a subscribe order but have since cancelled it. I will most likely go back to the medium roast and probably brew 10oz. to get the less bolt and flavor in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Moppetmom4

customer_reviews.title: Just Straight Bitter & Burnt Taste
customer_reviews.text: There is a complete lack of coffee taste. The grounds [& coffee they make] smell and taste burnt. I would rather pay double the price for good coffee than try to finish these! I recycle used coffee grounds for other uses, I cannot do this with these. I like dark & French roast coffees and espressos. They are full of flavor with a little bitterness. Not these!
customer_reviews.author: tonygump

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Variety Pack Revisited. Recommended with conditions.
customer_reviews.text: After ordering some other brands, I decided to go back and try the Amazon Basics flavors again. In the morning, I started with the "Bold" flavor. I don't know if it was a manufacturing consistency issue, but the following Bold K cups were actually bold as advertised. After drinking that batch up, I tried the "Medium." Not real strong but drinkable. I'll be trying the "light" next, but so far so good. I should have realized that Amazon isn't going to put its name on junk. They go for quality and usually fulfill that promise. I initially stated that the coffee was too weak on my first review, but after revisiting the coffee, found it to be as advertised. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: WC AlaskaTop Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: Delcious coffee at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I don't usually like decaffeinated coffee. However, I love coffee, but if I have a cup of caffeinated coffee after 2:00 pm, I'll be up all night. I read many reviews for decaffeinated coffee and based on the great reviews, I went with this one. I love the taste of the coffee !! It's rich & full of flavor, and I don't miss not having caffeinated coffee in the afternoons anymore. Great value as well.
customer_reviews.author: I. Fuhrmann

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I'm by no means a coffee connoisseur, else I would probably not be drinking from K-cups in the first place. I guessed that coffee labeled Columbian would taste similar regardless of brand, so I decided to try these. They are roughly 60% the price of the Folgers I usually buy. The taste is not quite as good, but good enough that I will keep buying these to save money.
customer_reviews.author: ariy

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is a good breakfast blend brew. It is not too weak as is true with some light roast coffee. I tasted a little bitterness, but I think that is just me, because there are only a handful of coffees with which I haven't experienced a bitter after taste. Good coffee for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ins44

customer_reviews.title: It's A Great Tasting Coffee
customer_reviews.text: We decided to try Amazon's Hazelnut blend; Hazelnut is one of our favorite coffee flavors and we frequently purchase the Casa Trail brand through Amazon and try to purchase our K-cups below .30/k-cup. This is between a breakfast blend and medium in strength, which works great for our taste. When Amazon offered an additional discount these broke down to 27 1/2 cents per k-cup, and we like it! I brew a 10 oz cup and this is perfect. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light roast
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bad. Smells good. But not a medium roast. Very light. When I added my creamer it just tasted like flavored water. So if you like your coffee stronger (I do) this isn’t the coffee for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Good French Vanilla Coffee
customer_reviews.text: After my wholesale club stopped selling my big brand French Vanilla coffee I was looking for another place to buy in bulk. Of course, I turned to Amazon (where - let's be honest - I buy almost everything anyway). While searching for the brand name coffee, I stumbled across this Amazon Basics variety. I was skeptical. But, after reading some other reviews, I decided to give it a try. It's really good! It has a mild vanilla flavor that's not "in your face" or overly-sweet but doesn't taste burned like some coffee does. And, the price is very economical for how many K-cups are included. I will be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Iz

customer_reviews.title: Amazon WAS my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is not good. Very florally and weak. It is cheap, but I guess you get what you pay for. Along with amazon in general. A whole order purchased over Black Friday weekend got refunded for undeliverable packages. Why would amazon not send out new ones, instead I have to reorder without the same discounts. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Outstandingly Full-Bodied Decaf Coffee at an Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: This decaffeinated coffee has a rich taste, with little of the "sour" under-taste that characterizes most decafs. While not quite as tasty and robust as my favorite non-decafs, I have not yet found a decaf that tastes as full-bodied as this one--and I've tried a whole range of them. On top of the outstanding taste, the price per pod is also very reasonable. Can't give this 5 stars for "presentation" because they come loose in a plain cardboard box, but this is 5-star coffee on what's really important--flavor and cost. Consequently, I've subscribed to periodic automatic deliveries to save even more money!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Hinkel

customer_reviews.title: On a par with supermarket brands, but weaker
customer_reviews.text: I'd describe this coffee as okay. Just okay. First of all, as others have said before me, the flavor is weak. When I make a cup I use less water because of that. In addition, the flavor makes me think of supermarket brands, such as Folgers or Maxwell house; but, again, weaker than those brands. I think of that sort of flavor as generic -- without the depth and character of, say, Sumatra; and without the punch of French or Italian roast. It's just plain weak coffee -- okay, but nothing to lure me out of bed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: needingknittles

customer_reviews.title: Good price, lacking in taste
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they were the most affordable value k-cups for the price. Didn’t bother to read the reviews since at 4 stars, how bad could they be? Following a week’s worth of k-cups, I realized that these aren’t what they were made out to be. At medium roast, I figured they’d be a pretty good balance for daily use at work, and I’m usually able to re-use k-cups once before they lose their flavor. That was certainly not the case with these. Great price, but if you like stronger flavored coffee I would pass on these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Appatently excellent for dark rast lovers
customer_reviews.text: I sent these to my son who prefers dark roast coffees and he reported they were excellent when he's usually a "meh" kind of kid. I asked him to save me a couple ( as I am currently backlogged on K-cups!!!), so may have my own opinion in a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Anna Heller

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Liked that the pods came in a simple bag inside the outer box. Made it easier for me to store and keep my rack of them full without having a bulky box around. I'll be reordering shortly. I should say I've tried several others coming in the more traditional cardboard boxes more suitable for a display. I like no box a whole lot. Oh, and did I mention the price was I think the best of any I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph W. Ledrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Decaf Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This was my 1st order of the decaf Amazon coffee. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and taste. None of the pods leaked while brewing as some of the reviews stated. The coffee tastes as good as any of the other pods available. I just ordered another shipment and would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Have double with grounds getting into coffee cup
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon label decaf is good tasting, reasonably priced but I can’t finish the brewed cup because of the grounds getting into the coffee. Don’t have that problem with the name brands. This coffee is roasted and packed in the USA, which is great, but the grounds can ruin a good cup of coffee. Would be 5 stars except for this. It might just be this box. I have Already ordered and received a new box but haven’t tried any K cups from that batch yet. It is hard to find reasonably priced decaf k cups.
customer_reviews.author: dmzlady

customer_reviews.title: High quality with rich flavor
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely picky about my coffee. 9 times out of 10 I end up donating the k-cups to my church group because I won’t drink the coffee. When I saw amazon had their own brand of k-cups I was skeptical but other amazon branded items had been very high quality...and my church group was in need of more k-cups...so I went ahead with an order. I am pleased that I did. The coffee is great! I got the variety box and have found both the light roast and donut blend deep flavored without being too bold (my usual complaint). My husband loves the bold blend. The price is beyond on-point. Overall, a great purchase that I will be repeating.
customer_reviews.author: Christina DeStefano

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Exciting
customer_reviews.text: This Amazon coffee came up on a deal, so we tried a 12 pack. It's quite underwhelming. Bland flavor, does not taste like a columbian roast should taste like. It's weak when brewed. If you take sweetener or creamer in your coffee, you'll need half as much because of the weakness. We'll stick with the San Francisco Bay coffee pods.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  🚑 & Jeff's Wife 💅Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2nd cup
customer_reviews.text: If you like your coffee dark and strong-this is not for you. I usually can only drink 1 cup of coffee a day (due to being highly sensitive to caffeine), but sometimes would like a second cup. This coffee works for that. Its a lighter roast that lets me have a warm drink without being too hyped up on caffeine. Its great for the afternoon or evening when you want a small pick me up but not to stay up all night.
customer_reviews.author: SYK

customer_reviews.title: WOW, Really?
customer_reviews.text: Not as costly as some so no problem to try. Some people making their k-cup need to rinse the machine out more then they do. This you do after you finish by starting a brew cycle without a k-cup and letting the hot water run through before turning off. Be sure to use fresh water every time. Don't let the water sit in the tank and better to use distilled water gallons. K-cups do not stay fresh very long, not months only weeks. If the coffee does not taste good now you know why
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for an alternative to Panera's Hazelnut This is NOT it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my local grocery has been out of Panera's Hazelnut Creme for over a month. The smell win it brews is awful (something like cooking corn chips) and it lingers even now nearly 12 hours after I fixed one cup despite spraying febreeze in my kitchen and living room. The taste is about on par with the smell even doctoring with milk and sweet cream creamer. Not pleased and dumping the other 11 pods in the trash. Save your money and buy the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth lighter roast. I normally drink Newman's own special blend for about two cents a cup more from Costco. I'm not going to switch to this, but it is a very good cup of coffee. I'm not a big fan of dark roasted, usually tastes burned to me. Since what I normally drink actually has more coffee per cup, this is a bit weaker, but certainly not weak by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent coffee - Major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: For the price the coffee is decent. My major gripe is the plastic pods are quite flimsy and 1/4th of the time they only squish instead of pierce in the Keurig which causes the Keurig to malfunction. I have to poke a hole in the bottom with a knife and carefully place back into the Keurig which is a pain. If I'm in a hurry I toss them which is a waste! If Amazon updates the quality of the pods themselves they would be a great deal, but because of the unneccessary hastle I will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its Decent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was expecting a variety of different coffee for me and my co-workers. Instead I was presented with just 3 different types of coffee. Light, Medium, and Dark which weren't bad for ~$20 for 60 though I wished it was more organized. When I first opened the box it looked like a box filled with packaging peanuts except the packaging peanuts turned out to be the K-cups. If you have an office filled with Co-workers that like coffee this could be a good idea. As for me, it wasn't a bad idea since I know I will have decent coffee for the next few months, but I think I will stick to Newman owns coffee or doughnut shop coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Jmemoli

customer_reviews.title: Amazon fresh k-cups rock!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding amazon fresh product. Has a smoother flavor than most name brand kcups. Many people believe these are just rebranded green mountain or victor allen cups, but I have the French vanilla and hazelnut amazon fresh cups as well as green mountain and victor allen cups in both flavors, and I did a taste off at work proving they are all clearly different coffees. The amazon brand was the most popular at work by far, good thing because they were also the least expensive by far. Great job as usual amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ace Farley

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Weak Flavor - Not a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews saying these pods produce a weak cup of coffee, but you never know about another person's tastes, so in consideration of the low price - I figured I'd give it a try. I normally use full-bodied coffee and then set my Keurig to the weakest setting, which produces a fairly mild cup of coffee. Even on the medium setting, these were too weak for my tastes. The coffee itself has a pleasant flavor, they just need to add more to the pod. Overall, I think this is a poor value and unless Amazon adds more coffee, I won't be buying this again or recommending it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: A little too light in flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love Hazelnut K-cups. The flavor blends well with the coffee and I use plenty of cream. This was not my favorite Hazelnut. I really prefer a bit more robust, but not real strong. The flavor was weak and the coffee was too. Will go back to my favorite, Gloria Jean's.
customer_reviews.author: stitchingmamatx

customer_reviews.title: From a coffee snob...
customer_reviews.text: I have been known as a coffee snob for years. I love my dark roast - very acidic coffee...and I drink it black. However, I appreciate and really enjoy this mix!!! I have been ordering this instead of my typical Starbucks pods a few rotations now and am really enjoying them!!! They have a good flavor (got to figure out your water to pod portion...duh) and stick with it. The pods hold up well and haven't had ONE explode on me! Thats a bonus!!! The amazon solima brand has been the same - love them all and much better value for my $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: SociallyAwkward & Happy

customer_reviews.title: Disspointed in taste.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this package of K-Cups and brewed a cup of coffee. I was very, very disappointed in the taste. It was very bitter - no coffee taste at all. Could this be returned for a refund?
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy N. Gainous

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting metallic aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try these k-cups since they are so inexpensive through subscribe and save and had decent reviews. I got the donut cafe flavor, since I usually get the donut shop types since they are a nice medium roast. I find these disgusting. They have a horrible metallic aftertaste that tastes like ant poison smells. It is not worth the savings at all.
customer_reviews.author: G.C.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth light roast, great for breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee. I find it smoother than Starbuck's Light Roasts (which I love as well though) and it is not too expensive. The form factor could be a little nicer, in that it just comes in a plain cardboard box which is hard to fit in any drawers or cupboards. But once I distribute it into smaller boxes then I can fit it in our K-cup drawer, so it's all good. Love the actual K-cups, though, they are a sunny yellow, which is nice to see in the morning. Good flavor, as advertised. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cy Wyss

customer_reviews.title: Great flavored Hazelnut Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to see this coffee back in stock. For an inexpensive, generic, Amazon brand coffee - this is quite good. It has a strong hazelnut flavor so no added creamers needed. It is not overly acidic or strong so no added sugar needed. I like my coffee black and mild to medium roast. This is spot on for someone who has similar tastes to myself. It even tastes good if you have to set it down and do not return to it until it has gone to room temperature!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Nice and tasty medium roast 😁
customer_reviews.text: I drink more decaf than regular coffee and its hard to find a good flavor, not too strong, but not too weak. Well, this decaf is great! Mellow, not bitter, not weak, a nice medium roast and great flavor! Will buy again! Amazon Fresh is a good decaf!! I have also bought the regular now, and flavor is great! I will be buying both again! A+😃😄
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Bare naked pods in an Amazon box.
customer_reviews.text: Hate the lack of seperate product packaging or interior box!! Considering the Covid situation, and the fact that these pods are used bare, directly in your coffee maker where water will be running over and through the pod! When were these boxed and by whom? Can't get myself to even try these. That's the price I pay for trying to save by ordering their brand. Maybe it states this packaging in the description but if it doesn't, it should!!
customer_reviews.author: Dog person

customer_reviews.title: Not Much To It
customer_reviews.text: It is a good thing this coffee was so cheap or it would be a total bust. I expected great flavor with Amazon putting their brand on it but I am really disappointed. If the label did not say Hazlenut, I would never have guessed. Don't think I'll be buying any more.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Light decaf coffee
customer_reviews.text: Basically, this is a basic light coffee. There isn't much depth to the flavor. It's not bold. It's great when augmented (sugar, cream, other things). Great for the office. As far as the packaging goes. I'm not a fan of the pods being dumped in a large box. I'm used to the smaller boxes with organized pods. The dump method makes them hard to store as I now have a large cardboard box in my pantry. Overall it's a good buy. I would purchase this again. It's a lot of coffee for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Bold doesn't have to mean bitter
customer_reviews.text: Strong bitter taste that caused me to return this coffee. Smelled and tasted over-roasted. I enjoy dark roast coffees like Green Mountain Dark Magic, Peets Major Dickason's Blend and French Roasts from several roasters. This one is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: rydvy

customer_reviews.title: only ok coffee
customer_reviews.text: only ok coffee - kind of weak. I had to use the "strong" brew cycle to get much flavor, and I still did not feel like the medium roast (which is usually what I use) had much flavor. The light and dark roasts were ok at strong brew. Although I drank it, I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: Not enough caffeine content!
customer_reviews.text: Is it tasty? Yes. Is it cheap? Relatively. Does it work? No. It takes twice as many cups of this coffee to achieve the same amount of stimulation as other, similarly priced coffees. For that reason, as much as I love the taste, this will be my last box of Amazon coffee - I'm going back to Grocery Outlet brands. Updated 5/24/2020 - Due to current world circumstances, I've had to come back to buying this stuff. Would you believe it's gotten even worse? I think they forgot to put the coffee in this latest batch, because with two splenda and some creamer, it tastes like I'm drinking a hot cup of cream.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dostal

customer_reviews.title: Count on about 1/5 of the cups to fail
customer_reviews.text: While the flavor was good and the value was very good, the cups themselves failed too often. They wouldn't drain properly into the bottom valve or they would spill grounds into the cup and then it has to be strained before you can drink it. So far, 4 or 20 have failed in this manner so plan to lose part of the product or deal with the straining as you transfer to another cup. Doesn't happen with the cheap Kroger brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anita O

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coffee, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee because it was a great value. It was pretty good coffee. I know kcups can not always brew the best cup of coffee but I really enjoyed the flavor. This coffee was not over roasted, no ground up tire flavor. I am more a light roast person, but really thought this was nice coffee. It was not as great as Blue Mountain Coffee, my personal favorite coffee, but still a good cup of coffee. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gertmm

customer_reviews.title: Yessssss!!! The Amazon did it again!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I am LOVING the Amazon brand. The phone chargers, the batteries, now the K Cups!! These Colombian K Cups are the shizz!! They taste amazing. There’s little to no taste difference between these and the McCafe Colombian that cost almost double. I’m sold as long as the price stays reasonable af! I am sooo in love with the Amazon rn fr.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Fresh K-Cups taste amazing for best price ever found.
customer_reviews.text: I have found a treasure! Amazon’s Fresh k-cups are every bit as good as name brand coffees, and their Colombian decaf offering is great. The price is the best I have ever found, and bests even the best sale price. Unbelievable value. I can recommend Amazon Fresh Fair Trade Sumatra and Peru in the regular (not decaf) varieties for the same reasons. Love the convenience of free shipping, best price, and large quantities PLUS love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne M. Galligan

customer_reviews.title: Bitter and acidic
customer_reviews.text: As far as price, this is a decent value for the cost compared to other brands of K cups. However, I cannot recommend the taste. The coffee seems rather bitter. But more importantly, it’s very acidic. Drinking this product gave me severe stomach upset, which I don’t normally get from other coffee products. For this reason I can’t recommend. Any individuals that have stomach sensitivities should probably avoid this particular coffee.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: I like exploring and trying new coffee brands, so I figured why not, for the price, a count of 60 seems reasonable. I honestly didn't like all, the medium rost didn't taste good, I mean it tasted like old coffee (you know if you have a bag of coffee grounds that's been sitting there and you brew the coffee and it doesn't taste that fresh!) this is how it tasted. The dark coffee was good. I honestly took the ones I didn't like to work and other employees used them!
customer_reviews.author: Hala

customer_reviews.title: I will definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is great. I almost did not order it based on a few very negative reviews, particularly those who said it was very weak even when brewing on the smallest setting. This is not what I am experiencing. I compared it to a well known name brand and found it just as flavorful. I actually opened both the name brand and the AmazonFresh pods and weighed the actual amount of coffee in each and it was the same amount of grams and both had a deep dark brown color. I will continue to order the AmazonFresh coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi44

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Smooth and Strong Coffee- not overly bitter like SB
customer_reviews.text: I disagree with the review calling this coffee weak. This coffee does a great job of waking me up. Another thing I like is the taste. I haven't been able to find a good coffee at a reasonable price that is an alternative to Starbucks which his what I have been drinking but consider it just a tad to strong and bitter. This has a nice strong flavor without the degree of bitterness Starbucks has. I'm a coffee snob and I'm about to order more!
customer_reviews.author: joyreaper

customer_reviews.title: Explodes in Keurig
customer_reviews.text: These taste pretty terrible. Additionally, they make a very pungent, manure like odor when brewed. Finally, at least 25 percent of them split open in my Keurig, causing coffee grounds to fill the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: The coffee itself is not strong at all, in fact it taste more like a vanilla dark tea. Instead of a medium roast, I would categorize it as a light roast for sure. As soon as it starts to brew, there's an aroma that fills the space and it smells so good. I recommend it to anyone who is looking for something smooth and not strong.
customer_reviews.author: Archangel

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping this was good coffee since it was an amazon brand
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was good coffee since it was an amazon brand. And I'm not a critic on coffee either. But this coffee is pretty bad, in fact, I'm thinking of throwing the rest of it away. I wouldn't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good french vanilla + hazelnut flavor!
customer_reviews.text: These k-cups were surprisingly good! I decided the give them a chance since the price was good and I’m glad that I did. The French vanilla is a nice flavor, not overpowering at all, but still a decently strong cup of coffee. Nice and fragrant as well. The hazelnut is also really good - sometimes hazelnut coffee can leave a little aftertaste, but this one doesn’t. I’m very satisfied and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: EMG

customer_reviews.title: OK. Not as flavorfull as I would like.  Updated
customer_reviews.text: I like a deep flavor in my coffee. You risk losing some of that with a decaf coffee and that is somewhat the case here. It has a good taste; just not very bold as compared to some of the other coffee's I've tried. I ordered it because it was a little less expensive. Might spend a little extra money next time. UPDATED Added one star. In all fairness, this is a MEDIUM roast coffee, not a bold coffee, so should not be compared as such. It tastes fine; just not very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Anthem

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite but ok...
customer_reviews.text: Taste is smooth and very similar in flavor to the donut shop coffees. Had to use less water for a richer cup as it seems a bit weak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is something as a bad coffee
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Peets coffee before, but then I decided to go with a budget version, so picked this one. That was a big mistake, personally even though I don't enjoy very strong coffee, but not that weak! I don't know, I have tried different amounts of water, result was always disappointing, you know the worst thing is, there are 60 of them! So I need to find a way to drink them, but I don't, so they are stuck at the back of the cupboard for now.
customer_reviews.author: Burcu

customer_reviews.title: I did not like anything about this coffee besides de the price
customer_reviews.text: I did not like anything about this coffee besides de the price. This is water down , no taste coffee ( for my taste) It should not call themselves a medium roast! It a light watery , can’t smell coffee when you make it. I will never buy it again. Can I return it? I used maybe 4 cups out of 80.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money for eight oclock hazelnut coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Very metalic artificial flavor. Waste of money will probably end up throwing out. Should of stuck with eight o’clock hazelnut coffee but was trying to save money. Again you get what you pay for. This was the consensus if four people.
customer_reviews.author: richard sartori

customer_reviews.title: Really good decaf that's not expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like a good, flavorful cup of coffee. At 4pm, I have to drink decaf (if I want to sleep that night!). I use my Keurig on 'strong' setting and the coffee I get is just fantastic. I honestly cannot tell the difference in flavor between this decaf and my regular coffee. I've been ordering this for over a year now and will continue to do so. Good job Amazon on this 'in house' product
customer_reviews.author: M. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: If you like Green Mountain French Vanilla, you probably won't like this!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered more Green Mountain French Vanilla on a subscription to get a decent price but needed something quick because I only had two pods left. Thought I'd try the Amazon French Vanilla (AmazonFresh 80 Ct. K-Cups, French Vanilla Flavored Medium Roast). Yech...I don't know what that flavor is that smells pretty good but has sort of an acetone after-taste. Yech! Hoping I can return 79 K-Cups quick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite coffee
customer_reviews.text: We like a medium to bold flavor that is not bitter. After trying this coffee, we added it to our monthly subscribe and save shipment. As a Costco shopper we always purchased the Costco Kirkland Pacific Bold as it is OK for the price. But doesn't have the smooth bold flavor of this Amazon Bold Dark Roast. If you like a smooth dark roast, try it! The price is great and every pod works without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: L Walls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Decaf Coffee ... at a very fair price!
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid coffee drinker. But, due to my blood pressure, my doctor strongly recommended that I switch to decaf. YUK! Brown sadness water ... until I discovered this! Don't know where Amazon sources this coffee, but they make a great K-cup of decaf. Well done, folks. Flavor - 5 stars. Value - 5 stars. Presentation? It comes in a brown Amazon box with all 80 cups loosely thrown in. So it's not exactly high on the beauty or appeal scale. But, hey, I'm okay with that. I'm not retailing the stuff. I'm DRINKING IT!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Cowsert

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: I think this is terrible tasting. I tried full cup and then half cup. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: pffphx

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Economical
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is good. This was the most least expensive option for hazelnut k cups I’ve found. I was just shocked to open the mailing package and find all 80 k cups floating around loose in the box. The other companies have them organized in smaller boxes of 12 or 24. This is a good deal, and money was saved avoiding excess packaging.... but it’s harder to organize them in your coffee cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: P. Berlin

customer_reviews.title: columbian flavor pretty good
customer_reviews.text: MD said only 1 coffee per day, but decaffinated ok. This one has pretty good flavor. No bitter taste. Drink about 3 cups per day. Could be just a little stronger or more flavorful but maybe you cant since it is decaf. Will order it again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, inexpensive k-cups
customer_reviews.text: AmazonFresh french vanilla k-cups have an excellent light taste. Just enough flavor without overpowering your taste buds. Unlike some other brands, they are not overly acidic. Pros: + Great flavor. + Inexpensive. + Works in Keurig 2.0 brewer. + Roasted and packed in the US. Cons: I wish it came in more flavors. The french vanilla is great, but I would like more variety.
customer_reviews.author: vac

customer_reviews.title: Packing needs work
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor and value. BUT they toss the pods in a box- no plastic bag or inner box- the box had a 3/4 inch gap so travel grime , dust etc got in -- the pod isn't something you open and empty - it gets popped open inside the machine and water flows thru it -- do I want to drink street grime? No, so I have to wipe off all 80 pods and rebox them .
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: very bland not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very bland taste. I couldn't believe it's coffee. Barely can taste it. Now I feel like I wasted money on a whole bunch of k-cups that I don't want to drink... save your money and buys other more reliable brands.
customer_reviews.author: DrBong

customer_reviews.title: Nice Price, Spotty Quality
customer_reviews.text: Lots of reviews on this product already. The flavor isn’t bad, and the price is good. What surprised me was the variation from pod to pod. Some were very weak, and some were much stronger. So much so that I checked that my coffee maker was dispensing the correct amount of water. The k cups seemed to be the issue. A little disappointed, and I think there are much better options out there, at the same or better price point.
customer_reviews.author: A. Maceroli

product_meta.title: AmazonFresh 80 Ct. K-Cups, Go For the Bold Dark Roast, Keurig K-Cup Brewer Compatible
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Dark Roast| Size:80 Count (Pack of 1)Dark roasted and destined to please, our AmazonFresh Go For The Bold single serve coffee pods are made with high quality 100 percent Arabica coffee. This complex blend’s full, bold flavor, notes of dark chocolate and long finish, make it complex, rich and dreamy. Enjoy singular satisfaction in every cup, every time, with AmazonFresh k cups, compatible with Keurig brewers.
feature_bullets: Dark roast coffee with a full, bold flavor
80 single serving pods compatible with Keurig brewing machines
Roasted and packed in the U.S.A
Satisfaction Guarantee: We’re proud of our products. If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
